New Records: The Detroit Pistons reached.500 for the first time after New Year's Day since 2019 with a 118-115 win over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists
Tim Hardaway Jr. added 26 points for Detroit
Jalen Duren had 14 points and 12 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Pistons were 3-33 after 36 games a season ago, have won seven of eight.
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons (18-18) have won seven of eight.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the Detroit Pistons' 118-115 win over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Others: Isaiah Stewart and Simone Fontecchio defended against Donovan Clingan's shot.
